oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Wind was formerly a man, but is now a bird, and lives in the mountain. By /han=kasso (L VIII.-8. 6709-6713, and 6694 rev., note). 1) p.6708v: |han=kass'o heard this from his mother (|xabbi-an), 2) p.6709v: the name of a hole (or cave) in the mountain, 3) See also Notes to the story of The Wind and The son of the Wind, 4) This story is found in Book VIII-8.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The Wind
